name: Reddit - Replace error images with pony versions
description: Replaces various error images on reddit with pony versions.
additional_info:
Replaces:

* Space 404 with  http://fabulouspony.deviantart.com/art/Space-Karma-reddit404b-png-255030774

* Desert 404 with http://fabulouspony.deviantart.com/art/Desert-Karma-reddit404c-png-271302214

* Narwhal 404 with http://fabulouspony.deviantart.com/art/Polar-Karma-reddit404e-png-272035284

* Trippy Forest 404 with http://fabulouspony.deviantart.com/art/Forest-Karma-reddit404a-png-277238067

* SIDT Space 404 with http://fabulouspony.deviantart.com/art/Sure-Ill-Draw-That-Space-Karma-reddit404d-png-278543366

* Broken F5 Hammer with http://fabulouspony.deviantart.com/art/Reddit-is-down-256181704

* Maintenance Bacta tank with http://fabulouspony.deviantart.com/art/Reddit-Pony-in-a-Bacta-Tank-253966638 (Now defunct, will update for the new maintenance page at a later date. It's a low priority since you almost never see the page.)

All credit for the artwork goes to FabulousPony. More coming soon!
